files.description: Defines the standard artifact schema for results.json (required/optional keys), figure naming conventions, and metadata fields including git commit, seed, and timestamps with validation helpers.

Implements a complete artifact writer that assembles metadata (git commit/dirty state, seed, ISO timestamps), enforces the schema, and writes results.json plus provides helpers for deterministic figure/file naming.
Provides robust utilities for obtaining git commit hash, branch, and dirty status with safe fallbacks for non-git environments.
Provides timestamp utilities (UTC ISO8601) used consistently across artifact metadata for start/end times and creation time.
Centralizes seed handling and reproducibility helpers to set and record seeds consistently across runs and in results.json metadata.
Updates the DoD checklist by adding a new 'Determinism/Replay' subsection describing required artifact schema compliance and replay-critical metadata fields.

missionDescription: Define a standard artifact schema (results.json keys, figure naming, metadata including git commit, seed, timestamps) and add a 'Determinism/Replay' subsection to /outputs/roadmap_v1.md DoD checklist.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes determinism as the main technical lever for stable iteration: reproducible JSON+figure outputs enable regression testing, consistent figures/tables in the report, and a clear DoD for exper...
